query:
INSERT INTO `crawler_settings` (`key`, `value`, `description`) VALUES
('crawl_interval_days', '7', '爬蟲執行間隔（天數）'),
('price_drop_threshold', '5', '價格下降通知閾值（百分比）'),
('price_increase_threshold', '10', '價格上升通知閾值（百分比）'),
('max_products_per_crawl', '100', '每次爬蟲最多爬取產品數量'),
('notify_on_sale', 'true', '是否在商品特價時發送通知'),
('user_agent', 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36', '爬蟲使用的 User-Agent');

INSERT INTO `notifications` (`productId`, `type`, `title`, `message`, `oldPrice`, `newPrice`, `changePercent`, `isRead`) VALUES
(1, 'price_drop', 'Neutrogena Hydro Boost 價格下降', 'Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel 50g 價格從 $34.99 降至 $24.99，降幅 28.58%！', 34.99, 24.99, -28.58, false),
(2, 'new_sale', 'Blackmores Bio C 開始特價', 'Blackmores Bio C 1000mg 150 Tablets 現在特價 $19.99（原價 $29.99），節省 $10！', 29.99, 19.99, -33.34, false),
(3, 'price_drop', 'Swisse Kids 價格下降', 'Swisse Kids Multivitamin Gummies 60 Pack 價格從 $19.99 降至 $14.99！', 19.99, 14.99, -25.01, true),
(4, 'new_sale', 'Amazonia Raw Protein 開始特價', 'Amazonia Raw Protein Isolate Vanilla 500g 特價中，現在只需 $39.99！', 49.99, 39.99, -20.00, true);
